clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in hilum, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in hilum.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in hilum.
Small pneumothorax on the hilum side.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
